articles.description: The Wales star has been looking at a number of options including training with Cardiff City in the short term as he prepares to maintain fitness ahead of Wales's World Cup campaign.
articles.content:

articles.title: Man dies after assault in south Gloucestershire village

articles.title: Oslo shooting: Terror investigation launched after deadly attack kills two and injures 10
articles.description: The attack occured just hours before the city’s Pride parade which has since been cancelled
articles.content:
